Dr. Toast Live @ Priceless

posted July 18, 2007 | music, shows

July 20-22, 2007, Belden, CA - Dr. Toast rocks the second annual False Profit Priceless campout with brand new original music! If you made it last year, you know this is the campout and dance event of the year. 3 days, 40 performers on three stages, live art, river swimming, exploding hydrogen bubbles, a mad tea party... and toast!

Dr. Toast live @ DIVIDEND

posted May 24, 2007 | music, shows

Thursday, May 24, 2007, 10pm-2am - A sudden spike in the Consumer Bass Index! Dr. Toast with Ooah (Glitch Mob, LA) and Danny Corn (Moontribe), @ Poleng Lounge, 1751 Fulton Ave @ Masonic, San Francisco.  $5. Brought to you by False Profit, LLC

Your Name On Toast

posted March 26, 2007 | toast-links

Here's how it works.  You send them money and they put your name (or slogan, or whatever you like) on a piece of toast and post it up on the internets for all the world to wonder at.  All proceeds go to charity!  www.yournameontoast.com

Arrrr - Pirate Toaster!

posted March 19, 2007 | toasters

At last I am able to fulfill my lifelong dream of using the words "pirate" and "toaster" in the same sentence!  This extremely handy device from Germany sears an image of skull-and-crossbones into your toast.  Now I know what I'm having for breakfast on the next International Talk-Like-A-Pirate Day.  Avast!

Dr. Toast Live at Howweird Street Faire

posted March 19, 2007 | music, shows

Sunday, May 6, 2007 @ 3pm - Dr. Toast rocks the Dub Beautiful / False Profit stage at the Howweird Street Faire! This is likely the last Howweird fair, so be sure to make it! www.howweird.org

Dr. Toast Live at Experiment #3 @ Fat City

posted March 19, 2007 | music, shows

Friday, May 4, 2007 - Dr. Toast opens up the main room for a night featuring Lawgiverz, Audiovoid, Mozaic, and more! tribes.tribe.net/experimentsf

Dr. Toast live at NASA Ames

posted March 19, 2007 | music, shows

Friday, April 13, 2007 @ 6pm - Dr. Toast spins a live downtempo laptop set in an aircraft hangar at NASA! Yuri's Night is a celebration of the anniversary of the first human spaceflight with a fusion of art, science, music, and dance. The lineup also includes Plaid, Telefon Tel Aviv, Bluetech, Sutekh, Ooah+Boreta, Mr. Projectile+Spacetime Continuum, RD, Welder, Mozaic, and the Space Cowboys Unimog! http://worldspaceparty.com/sounds.php

Charles Kaufman's Toaster Paintings

posted January 8, 2007 | toast-links, toasters

Charles Kaufman paints toasters in surrealistic settings. The prevailing kinetic gestures evoke a dynamicism that transcends the too-often static familiarity of breakfast. Rating:

Roller Toaster

posted November 29, 2006 | toasters

Industrial designer Jaren Goh's new Roller Toaster represents a major advance in modern toasting mechanics.  It smoothly pulls in the bread, wrings out all the un-toasted-ness, and drops the hot, crispy result onto your plate.

Toast Leaners' Club

posted November 15, 2006 | toast-links

From the Toast Leaners' Club website: "Why lean toast? One might equally ask "Why breathe?", "Why live?" or "Why exist?". To cool toast with such joyous efficiency is to take delight in each crunchy bite, each crisp morsel, and repel the evils of toast with a soggy underside or sodden with molten margarine." Rating: Pictured below: a "basic two-slice lean".
